If you ordered other items from Jostens, the entire balance must be paid before caps and gowns may be collected. I have sent separate emails to those who have a balance with Jostens.

Thank you and take care!

Janna Davis

Important Reminders about Student Material Pick Up: Sat., March 21
*One family (not individuals) per time slot in the Sign Up Genius link posted on the school's website and Facebook page
*Respect the 6ft rule whenever possible and touch as few surfaces as possible
*Remove all items from lockers/desks - sort personal items at home so as not to prolong time in the building
*6-12 students: Keep Chromebooks
*If you need or are keeping a textbook as a school resource for the months ahead, they will need to be checked out
*Drop off library books
*Band instruments, gym clothes, welding clothes and projects should be picked up (all art projects will be held until further notice)
*Stop at the office before leaving the building to check in/out with secretaries

Thank you for your patience in this process, as this is uncharted territory for all of us.
